	User requested a React + TypeScript Vite project.

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Project scaffolded using `npx create-vite@latest . --template react-ts`

- [x] Customize the Project
	No customization needed for "Hello World" starter project.

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	No specific extensions required; Vite works out of the box with VS Code.

- [x] Compile the Project
	Project builds successfully with no errors. Dependencies installed via npm.

- [x] Create and Run Task
	Dev server task created and running on http://localhost:5174/

- [x] Launch the Project
	Dev server is actively running and ready for development.

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	README.md and copilot-instructions.md files are in place and up to date.

## Project Details

**Project Name:** reactapp-5
**Framework:** React 19.2.0
**Build Tool:** Vite 7.3.1
**Language:** TypeScript 5.9.3
**Linting:** ESLint 9.39.1

## Available Scripts

- `npm run dev` - Start development server (running on http://localhost:5174/)
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## Getting Started

The development server is already running. Open http://localhost:5174/ in your browser to see your React app.

For more information, see [README.md](../../README.md).
